name: 蔡銘修
objective: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.
schedule:
01 2/23 Course introduction and description, overall overview of learning psychology
02 3/02 The physiological mechanism of learning (1): Brain and Learning
03 3/09 The physiological mechanism of learning (2): Cognitive Neuroscience-Attention
04 3/16 The Physiological Mechanism of Learning (3): Cognitive Neuroscience-Perception
05 3/23 The Physiological Mechanism of Learning (4): Cognitive Neuroscience-Memory
06 3/30 The Theory of Constraining Learning: Behaviorism 1
07 4/06 No class
08 4/13 The Theory of Constraining Learning: Behaviorism 2
09 4/20 Midterm Week
10 4/27 Bandura Social Learning Theory, Constructivism Theory
11 5/04 Discovery learning theory, Gagne learning condition theory
12 5/11 Vygotsky Social Cognitive Development Theory
13 5/18 Self-adjusted learning, academic challenges, academic challenges, methods to enhance self-concept
14 5/25 New topics for learning: Language, thinking, problem solving and creativity
15 6/01 Final Presentation 1
16 6/08 Conference(No Class)
17 6/15 Final Presentation 2
18 6/22 Final week
scorePolicy:
Attendance 20%
Class Assignment 40%(Please Join google classroom "vlb2vcf" for week's assignments)
Final presentation and report 40%
